Package gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD

Interface Summary
IViewComponent2D Any class that implements this interface will interpret and display data in a graphical form.
 

Class Summary
ArrayGenerator This class generates values for an array based on an equation.
ImageViewComponent This class allows the user to view data in the form of an image.
TableViewComponent The TableViewComponent is used to display data in a table.
